getTakeTemplate

public static ExertionEnvelop getTakeTemplate(Uuid parentID,
                                              Uuid childID)
Simple method that generates the basic template to retrieve a specific completed ExertionEnvelop from the space

Parameters:
parentID - This ID will be the basis for creating the template for picking up task/job from the space
Returns:
ExertionEnvelop Returns the template for picking up task/job from the space, state is set to DONE
